coded_answer.p: With reference to the letter from you., I would like to inform you of some further information, as followfollows.

First of all, I am able to joyjoin the camp only in July because thenthat month will beis my school holiday. I would prefer tents to longlog cabins because I think it will be more interesting and exciting than liveto liveto stay in longlog cabins. I am also interested in swimming and sailing,. I am always go to the swimming pool when I have time, our. Our family used to live near the sea sideseaside, we. We would go sailing on the weekend and I miss it very much

Finally, I don't know much about there, is. Is there anything should II should bring with me? What is the weather going to be like? Because, because I want to know what kind of clothes should II should bring with me? And how much meneymoney should II should havetake?
I look forward to hearing from you.

Most people believe that shopping is the most entertaining way.
